messages.subject: Re: Unschooling gatherings
messages.msgSnippet: ... year? ... They are changing the name and including more spiritual/new agey/personal growth type stuff in addition to the unschooling. It looks like they
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Deborah" <DACunefare@...>
wrote:
>
> --- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Nicole Willoughby
> <cncnawilloughby@> wrote:
> >
> > I didnt see rethinking education . Are they having that one this
year?
>
> I assume that Rethinking Education will take place this year, but I
> won't add it to the calender listing or the map until there is
> information available on 2009 dates and location. The RE website
> currently lists information for the 2008 conference.
>
> Deborah in IL
>

They are changing the name and including more spiritual/new
agey/personal growth type stuff in addition to the unschooling. It
looks like they did that this year too, if you look at the workshops
but now they're going to keep going more that direction apparently.

Ren

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling gatherings
messages.msgSnippet: ... I assume that Rethinking Education will take place this year, but I won t add it to the calender listing or the map until there is information available on
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Nicole Willoughby
<cncnawilloughby@...> wrote:
>
> I didnt see rethinking education . Are they having that one this year?

I assume that Rethinking Education will take place this year, but I
won't add it to the calender listing or the map until there is
information available on 2009 dates and location. The RE website
currently lists information for the 2008 conference.

Deborah in IL

Nicole

Don't worry that children never listen to you : worry that they are always watching you--Robert Fulghum

messages.subject: Unschooling gatherings
messages.msgSnippet: To help folks locate the next regional or larger unschooling gathering, I ve added a new map feature to the unschooling circuit riders yahoo group. You don t
messages.messageBody:
To help folks locate the next regional or larger unschooling gathering, I've
added a new map feature to the unschooling circuit riders yahoo group. You
don't need to be a member of the group to view the map. Listings include basic
information needed to find the next gathering - date, location, and a link to
the conference website. Check it out and let me know if you find it useful. :)

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingcircuitriders/app/placesmap/view/map

Deborah in IL
DACunefare@...


**************
New year...new news. Be the first to know
